short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cut through the noise with Haystack Glossary.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"The Haystack Glossary Chrome extension puts your Glossary at your fingertips, no matter where you are. Improve your Haystack Glossary experience with this complementary Chrome extension."

Features:
"View all Haystack Glossary terms."
"Add new terms to your Haystack Glossary."
